description: This file defines a mock class PersistentStoreImplementationMock for testing, which implements multiple interfaces related to a persistent key-value store, including registration of notifications, setting/getting/deleting keys, namespace operations, cache flushing, and scope-based storage queries.

classes.name: PersistentStoreImplementationMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing various store interfaces for unit testing purposes, leveraging Google Mock to mock methods related to key-value store operations, namespace management, cache control, and scope limits.

methods.name: ~PersistentStoreImplementationMock
methods.description: Default destructor for the mock class.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks the registration of a notification callback for IStore or IStore2.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks the unregistration of a notification callback.

methods.name: SetValue
methods.description: Mocks setting a key-value pair within a namespace or scope.

methods.name: GetValue
methods.description: Mocks retrieving a value for a key within a namespace or scope.

methods.name: DeleteKey
methods.description: Mocks deletion of a specified key within a namespace or scope.

methods.name: DeleteNamespace
methods.description: Mocks deletion of an entire namespace.

methods.name: FlushCache
methods.description: Mocks flushing of the store's cache.

methods.name: GetKeys
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of keys within a scope and namespace.

methods.name: GetNamespaces
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of namespaces within a scope.

methods.name: GetStorageSizes
methods.description: Mocks fetching storage sizes for a scope.

methods.name: GetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks retrieving storage limit for a namespace.

methods.name: SetNamespaceStorageLimit
methods.description: Mocks setting a storage limit for a namespace.
